properties.name: Grant Park
properties.location:
337 E. Randolph St.
Chicago, IL 60601
properties.description: Grant Park is a 319-acre urban park in Chicago's Loop community area, often referred to as "Chicago's front yard." Established in 1844 and renamed in 1901 to honor President Ulysses S. Grant, the park has expanded over time through land reclamation. It encompasses notable attractions such as Millennium Park, Buckingham Fountain, the Art Institute of Chicago, and the Museum Campus. The park hosts various public gatherings and large annual events, including the Taste of Chicago food festival, the Grant Park Music Festival, the Chicago Jazz Festival, the Chicago Blues Festival, and Lollapalooza, a rock concert festival. Additionally, it serves as the starting and finishing point for the Chicago Marathon and hosts the annual NASCAR Chicago street race.

properties.name: Field Museum
properties.location:
1400 S Lake Shore Dr
Chicago, IL 60605
United States
properties.description: The Field Museum in Chicago is one of the largest natural history museums in the world, renowned for its impressive collections and exhibitions. Established in 1893, it showcases a vast array of artifacts, including fossils, ancient mummies, and cultural treasures from around the globe. Among its most famous exhibits is Sue, the largest and most complete T. rex skeleton ever discovered. The museum also focuses on research and education, making it a vital resource for both the public and scientists alike. Visitors can explore interactive displays and participate in guided tours to deepen their understanding of natural history.

properties.name: Buckingham Fountain
properties.location:
301 S Columbus Dr
Chicago, IL 60605
United States
properties.description: Buckingham Fountain, a major landmark in Chicago's Grant Park, is one of the largest fountains globally. Kate Buckingham gifted the fountain to the city in 1927 in honor of her brother. Designed by Edward H. Bennett, its elaborate design and hourly water displays captivate tourists and residents. It features a high central jet surrounded by smaller jets. The fountain is near Cloud Gate and offers skyline views. The surrounding area has gardens and views of Lake Michigan. It's a popular spot for photos, relaxation, and enjoying the cityscape.

properties.name: Glessner House
properties.location:
1800 S Prairie Ave
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: Glessner House is a historic house museum designed by renowned architect Henry Hobson Richardson, completed in 1887. This distinctive building is recognized for its Richardsonian Romanesque style and serves as a key example of 19th-century architecture in the United States. The house was designed for the wealthy Glessner family and is now preserved as a museum, showcasing its historical significance and architectural details. Visitors can explore its original interiors and learn about life during the late 1800s, along with the family's contributions to Chicago's cultural landscape.

properties.name: Shedd Aquarium
properties.location:
1200 S DuSable Lk Shr Dr
Chicago, IL 60605
United States
properties.description: Shedd Aquarium is one of the largest indoor aquariums in the world, located on the shores of Lake Michigan in Chicago. Opened in 1930, it houses over 32,000 animals representing more than 1,500 species. Visitors can explore diverse exhibits, including a Caribbean reef, Amazon rainforest, and the famous aquatic shows featuring dolphins and sea lions. The aquarium emphasizes conservation and education, providing interactive experiences and opportunities to learn about marine life and habitats. Shedd Aquarium is a key attraction for both tourists and locals, offering a blend of entertainment and ecological awareness.

properties.name: Abbott Oceanarium
properties.location:
1200 S Lake Shore Dr
Chicago, IL 60605
United States
properties.description: The Abbott Oceanarium, part of Chicago's Shedd Aquarium, is a premier marine mammal pavilion that offers visitors an immersive experience into the aquatic world. This expansive facility houses a variety of marine mammals, including beluga whales, Pacific white-sided dolphins, sea otters, and California sea lions. The Oceanarium features a 1,000-seat amphitheater where daily educational presentations showcase the natural behaviors of these animals. Visitors can also explore the Polar Play Zone, an interactive area designed for children, and enjoy dining options with scenic views of Lake Michigan. The Abbott Oceanarium is renowned for its commitment to conservation and education, providing a unique opportunity to connect with marine life.

properties.name: Chinese American Museum of Chicago
properties.location:
238 W 23rd St
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: The Chinese American Museum of Chicago serves as a vital link to the rich heritage of Chinese Americans in the region. Housed in a historic building, the museum features exhibits that highlight the cultural contributions and challenges faced by this community throughout history. Visitors can explore artifacts, photographs, and personal stories that reflect the vibrant journey of Chinese Americans. The museum also organizes educational programs and events that encourage community engagement and appreciation of multiculturalism.

properties.name: Chicago's Chinatown Gateway
properties.location:
2206 S Wentworth Ave
Chicago, IL 60616
USA
properties.description: Chicago's Chinatown Gateway, often referred to as the 'Dragon Gate,' is a striking landmark that symbolizes the vibrant Chinese culture within the neighborhood. Located at the entry point to Chinatown, this ornate archway features traditional Chinese architectural designs and intricate decorations. It serves as a welcoming gesture to visitors exploring the rich history and cultural heritage of the area's residents. Surrounding the gateway are bustling shops, restaurants, and cultural sites, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists alike.

properties.name: Radius Chicago
properties.location:
640 W Cermak Rd
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: Radius Chicago is a versatile event space situated in the heart of the city. It is designed to host a variety of events including concerts, corporate gatherings, and social functions. The venue boasts a modern aesthetic, with expansive interiors that can accommodate large crowds. Equipped with state-of-the-art sound and lighting systems, Radius offers a dynamic setting for any occasion. Its location provides easy access to public transportation and nearby attractions, making it a convenient choice for both local and visiting guests.

properties.name: This Is Feeling Photography
properties.location:
2215 S Ford Ave #302
Chicago, IL 60616
USA
properties.description: This Is Feeling Photography is a photography studio located in Chicago, known for capturing moments that resonate with emotions and experiences. Focused on travel and lifestyle photography, it offers services for personal portraits, events, and destination shoots. The studio emphasizes storytelling through images, allowing clients to create lasting memories in visually captivating ways. It is a go-to place for anyone looking to document their journeys or special occasions with a unique artistic flair.

properties.name: Cermak Road Bridge
properties.location:
500 W Cermak Rd
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: The Cermak Road Bridge is a double-leaf bascule bridge that spans the Chicago River, connecting the Near South Side and Bridgeport neighborhoods. Completed in 1906, it is an example of early 20th-century engineering and is part of Chicago's extensive network of movable bridges. The bridge is named after Anton Cermak, a former mayor of Chicago, and plays a crucial role in the city's transportation infrastructure, accommodating both vehicular and pedestrian traffic. Its design allows for the passage of boats and ships, highlighting Chicago's historical reliance on its waterways for commerce and transportation.

properties.name: Michelada Fest
properties.location:
1000 W Cermak Rd
Chicago, IL 60608
United States
properties.description: Michelada Fest is an annual celebration of Latin music, culture, and the popular Mexican drink, the michelada-a cocktail made with beer, lime juice, sauces, spices, and chili or chamoy. The festival features live performances by renowned artists, diverse food vendors, and various cultural activities. In 2025, the event was scheduled for July 19-20 at Oakwood Beach, with headliners including Grupo Firme, Anitta, Danny Ocean, and Luis R. Conriquez. However, due to uncertainties surrounding artist visas and the political climate, the festival was canceled. The organizers expressed their commitment to returning in the future, aiming to provide a safe and vibrant space for the community to unite over shared cultural pride and love of music.

properties.name: Chicago Arts District
properties.location:
1945 S Halsted St
Chicago, IL 60608
United States
properties.description: The Chicago Arts District is a vibrant arts community in Chicago's Pilsen neighborhood, encompassing several contiguous blocks of lofts, studios, and retail spaces for artists and gallerists. The district hosts the '2nd Friday Gallery Night' every month, where more than 30 galleries open their doors to showcase new exhibitions, offering a unique opportunity to engage with local artists and their work.

properties.name: Thalia Hall
properties.location:
1807 S Allport St
Chicago, IL 60608
United States
properties.description: Thalia Hall, located in Chicago's Pilsen neighborhood, is known for its live music events and historic charm. Originally an opera house, the venue offers a blend of old and new aesthetics. Concertgoers appreciate the friendly staff, cleanliness, and intimate listening experience. The venue has bars and a restaurant. The seating arrangement is well-designed, ensuring good views of the stage. The venue is surrounded by restaurants, bars and cool independent stores. The staff has been commended for being kind and helpful, even offering free water.

properties.name: National Public Housing Museum
properties.location:
919 S Ada St
Chicago, IL 60607
United States
properties.description: The National Public Housing Museum is located in Chicago. It focuses on educating visitors about the history, nuances, and ingenuity that developed within public housing. The museum uses storytelling, visuals, audio, and video to bring history to life. Some exhibits immerse visitors in others' lived experiences, and bring attention to Indigenous people. Guided apartment tours are available.

properties.name: Jane Addams Hull-House Museum
properties.location:
800 S Halsted St
Chicago, IL 60607
USA
properties.description: The Jane Addams Hull-House Museum, located at 800 S Halsted St in Chicago, Illinois, is a historic site dedicated to the legacy of social reformer Jane Addams. Established in 1889, Hull-House was a pioneering settlement house that offered a range of services to immigrants and working-class residents, including education, childcare, and cultural programs. The museum comprises two of the original thirteen buildings: the Hull Home and the Residents' Dining Hall. Visitors can explore exhibits that showcase the history of Hull-House and its impact on social reform. The museum is part of the University of Illinois Chicago and serves as a resource for those interested in the history of social change.

properties.name: National Hellenic Museum
properties.location:
333 S Halsted St
Chicago, IL 60661
United States
properties.description: The National Hellenic Museum is the premier institution in the United States dedicated to the preservation and celebration of Greek history and culture. Located in Chicago's vibrant Greektown neighborhood, the museum offers a rich array of exhibits that explore the Greek immigrant experience, ancient Greek history, and contemporary Greek culture. The museum's collection includes artifacts, photographs, and documents that tell the story of Greek heritage and its influence on American society. In addition to its permanent and rotating exhibits, the museum hosts educational programs, lectures, and cultural events that engage visitors of all ages.

properties.name: Chicago Bulls
properties.location:
1901 W Madison St
Chicago, IL 60612
United States
properties.description: The United Center, located at 1901 W Madison St, Chicago, IL 60612, is a prominent indoor arena serving as the home for the NBA's Chicago Bulls and the NHL's Chicago Blackhawks. Opened in 1994, it replaced the historic Chicago Stadium and has since hosted numerous sporting events, concerts, and conventions. The arena boasts a seating capacity of approximately 20,917 for basketball games and up to 23,500 for concerts. Notable features include statues of sports legends like Michael Jordan, Bobby Hull, and Stan Mikita. In 2017, a 190,000-square-foot atrium was added, featuring the Madhouse Team Store and Queenie's Supper Club & Cocktails. The United Center is also known for its acoustics, designed to amplify crowd noise, creating an electrifying atmosphere during events.

properties.name: Color Factory Chicago
properties.location:
233 S Wacker Dr Lower Level 2
Chicago, IL 60606
United States
properties.description: Color Factory Chicago is an immersive art experience that celebrates color through a series of interactive installations. Located in the heart of Chicago, this attraction invites visitors to engage in creative play and appreciate art in a vibrant and sensory-rich environment. Guests can wander through various themed rooms, each designed to evoke joy and inspire creativity, making it a perfect spot for art lovers and families alike. With its innovative approach to art and community engagement, Color Factory offers a unique blend of exploration and artistic expression.

properties.name: Civic Opera House
properties.location:
20 N Wacker Dr STE 400
Chicago, IL 60606
United States
properties.description: The Civic Opera House, located at 20 North Wacker Drive in Chicago, Illinois, is a historic opera venue that has been the permanent home of the Lyric Opera of Chicago since 1954. The building, completed in 1929, features Art Deco architecture and includes a 45-story office tower and two 22-story wings. The main performance space, named the Ardis Krainik Theatre, seats 3,276, making it the second-largest opera auditorium in North America. The venue has hosted a variety of performances, including operas, ballets, and concerts, and has been a significant cultural landmark in Chicago for decades.

properties.name: Washington Square Park
properties.location:
901 N Clark St
Chicago, IL 60610
USA
properties.description: Washington Square Park is a historic urban park located in Chicago's Near North Side. Established in the mid-1800s, it offers a tranquil escape amidst the city's hustle and bustle. The park features lush green spaces, walking paths, and a picturesque landscape, making it a popular spot for locals and visitors alike. It is surrounded by notable architecture and provides amenities such as benches and playgrounds for families. Washington Square Park serves as a gathering place for community events and a peaceful retreat for those seeking relaxation.

properties.name: Lincoln Park
properties.location:
2736 N Clark St
Chicago, IL 60614
United States
properties.description: Lincoln Park is Chicago's largest public park, spanning over 1,200 acres along Lake Michigan's shoreline. It stretches seven miles from Grand Avenue to Ardmore Avenue. The park features numerous attractions, including the Lincoln Park Zoo, Lincoln Park Conservatory, and the Chicago History Museum.

properties.name: The Brewster Building
properties.location:
2800 N Pine Grove Ave
Chicago, IL 60657
United States
properties.description: The Brewster Building, located at 2800 N Pine Grove Ave in Chicago's Lakeview neighborhood, is a historic residential building completed in 1896. Designed by architect Enock Hill Turnock, it features Romanesque Revival architecture with a pink Jasper granite exterior. The building is a Chicago Landmark and has been home to notable residents, including Illinois Governor John Peter Altgeld and actor Charlie Chaplin. It has also been featured in films such as 'Child's Play' and 'Running Scared.'

properties.name: Peggy Notebaert Nature Museum
properties.location:
2430 N Cannon Dr
Chicago, IL 60614
United States
properties.description: The Peggy Notebaert Nature Museum is an esteemed institution located in Chicago, dedicated to connecting visitors with the natural world. It features interactive exhibits covering topics from local wildlife to ecological conservation. The museum is home to a stunning butterfly house, where visitors can observe various butterfly species in a tropical setting. With programs aimed at educating the community about environmental stewardship, the museum serves as a resource for conservation efforts. Its scenic location also includes access to beautiful green spaces along the Lincoln Park area.

properties.name: Next Wave Watersports
properties.location:
2601 N Cannon Dr I Dock
Chicago, IL 60614
USA
properties.description: Next Wave Watersports is a water sports company located along the scenic shores of Lake Michigan in Chicago. They provide a range of aquatic activities, including paddleboarding, kayaking, and jet skiing, catering to both beginners and experienced enthusiasts. Guests can enjoy the stunning views of the Chicago skyline while engaging in various water sports. The facility is positioned to serve both locals and tourists, offering equipment rentals and guided tours to enhance the outdoor experience on the lake.

properties.name: Chicago History Museum
properties.location:
1601 N Clark St
Chicago, IL 60614
United States
properties.description: The Chicago History Museum offers a deep dive into the rich history of Chicago through engaging exhibits and interactive displays. Established in 1856, the museum features a vast collection of artifacts, photographs, and documents that showcase the city's development from its founding to modern times. Highlights include exhibits on famous events, the city's diverse neighborhoods, and notable figures in Chicago's history. The museum also provides educational programs and events, appealing to both locals and tourists interested in learning more about the city's vibrant heritage.

properties.name: The Art Institute of Chicago
properties.location:
111 S Michigan Ave
Chicago, IL 60603
United States
properties.description: The Art Institute of Chicago is one of the oldest and largest art museums in the United States. Renowned for its diverse collection, it houses over 300,000 artworks, including masterpieces by artists such as Grant Wood, Georgia O'Keeffe, and Vincent van Gogh. The museum's iconic neoclassical building features a grand entrance with bronze lion statues. Visitors can explore a variety of galleries showcasing American, European, Asian, and contemporary art. The museum also offers engaging exhibitions, educational programs, and a picturesque courtyard, making it a must-visit cultural landmark in Chicago.

properties.name: Maggie Daley Park
properties.location:
337 E Randolph St
Chicago, IL 60601
United States
properties.description: Maggie Daley Park is a vibrant urban oasis located in the heart of Chicago, spanning 20 acres of lush landscapes and recreational facilities. The park features a unique climbing wall, mini-golf, and a skating ribbon for seasonal activities. Families can enjoy the enchanting children's garden, complete with whimsical sculptures and play areas. With picturesque pathways, picnic spots, and beautiful views of the city's skyline, this park is a popular destination for both locals and tourists. Its design integrates nature and art, making it a serene escape and a hub for community events.

properties.name: Cloud Gate
properties.location:
201 E Randolph St
Chicago, IL 60602
United States
properties.description: Cloud Gate, often referred to as 'The Bean,' is a stunning sculpture designed by artist Anish Kapoor. Completed in 2006, it is made of highly polished stainless steel and reflects the Chicago skyline and surroundings. This iconic piece of art is popular among visitors for its unique shape and mirror-like surface, which creates captivating reflections. Cloud Gate measures 66 feet long, 33 feet high, and 42 feet wide, making it a striking presence in Millennium Park, where it invites both photography and interaction.

properties.name: Burger Bar Chicago
properties.location:
1150 S Michigan Ave
Chicago, IL 60605
United States
properties.description: Burger Bar Chicago offers a diverse menu featuring gourmet burgers, including the acclaimed Bacon Cheeseburger, and a selection of craft beers. The restaurant provides options for takeout, delivery, and reservations, accommodating both dine-in and takeout experiences. The casual atmosphere is complemented by outdoor seating and live TV, making it suitable for gatherings any night of the week. The menu also includes vegan and vegetarian selections, ensuring a variety of choices for all guests.

properties.name: Nepal House
properties.location:
1301 S Michigan Ave
Chicago, IL 60605
United States
properties.description: Nepal House is a family-owned restaurant in Chicago's South Loop, offering a fusion of Himalayan, Nepalese, Pakistani, and Indian cuisines. The menu features dishes like momo, thalis, dal-bhaat, curries, roti, and naan. The restaurant provides vegan options, delivery, takeout, and catering services. It is wheelchair accessible and offers a casual, cozy atmosphere suitable for groups and families.

properties.name: Victory Tap | South Loop
properties.location:
1416 S Michigan Ave
Chicago, IL 60605
United States
properties.description: Victory Tap | South Loop is a neighborhood Italian restaurant situated at 1416 S Michigan Ave in Chicago's South Loop. The establishment features a spacious bar and offers a variety of Italian dishes, including classics like meatballs, chicken parmesan, and specialty pizzas. The ambiance is cozy and welcoming, making it a popular spot for both locals and visitors. The restaurant also provides private dining spaces suitable for events of up to 150 guests, with menus curated by Chef Joe Farina.

properties.name: La Cantina Grill
properties.location:
1911 S Michigan Ave
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: La Cantina Grill, established in 2006, is an authentic Mexican restaurant situated in Chicago's South Loop, near Soldier Field and McCormick Place. The restaurant offers a full-service bar with a diverse selection of tequilas and mezcals, along with fresh margaritas and craft beers. Signature dishes include traditional enchiladas, a variety of tacos, fajitas, and specialty items like Lomo en Salsa de Arbol. A notable feature is its extensive vegan menu, featuring options such as Upton's Seitan Chorizo and Good Planet Mozzarella vegan cheese. The outdoor sidewalk café provides a vibrant setting to enjoy meals and drinks while observing the bustling Michigan Avenue.

properties.name: Chicago Oyster House
properties.location:
1933 S Indiana Ave
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: Chicago Oyster House, established in 2013, is a seafood and steak restaurant situated in Chicago's South Loop neighborhood, near the McCormick Convention Center. The restaurant offers a diverse menu featuring fresh oysters, sushi, and prime steaks, including bone-in and dry-aged cuts. Guests can enjoy a cozy atmosphere with two raw bars serving a variety of East and West Coast oysters. The establishment also provides private event hosting for occasions such as weddings, birthdays, and corporate meetings, accommodating up to 175 people.

properties.name: Lips - Chicago
properties.location:
2229 S Michigan Ave
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: Lips Chicago, located at 2229 S. Michigan Avenue, is a vibrant drag-themed restaurant and performance venue. Opened in August 2019, it features nightly shows with local drag queens serving as both performers and servers. The venue boasts opulent decor, including four eight-foot crystal chandeliers, pink leopard tufted walls, and velvet curtains. The menu, crafted by Executive Chef Tom J. Schmitt, offers dishes like grilled salmon, NY steak fritte, parmesan-crusted chicken, lobster ravioli, and jumbo shrimp fettuccine. The restaurant also hosts themed nights such as Twisted Broadway, Dinner with the Divas, Celebrity Divas, and Dragalicious Gospel Brunch on Sundays. Lips Chicago is an ideal spot for celebrating various occasions, including birthdays, bachelorette parties, and more.

properties.name: Moody Tongue
properties.location:
2515 S. Wabash Ave.
Chicago, 60616
USA
properties.description: Moody Tongue is a restaurant and brewery in Chicago, Illinois, known for its innovative approach to dining by pairing its own craft beers with a creative menu. The establishment offers a contemporary dining experience, featuring a range of house-crafted beers alongside a refined selection of dishes. The restaurant has received one Michelin star, reflecting its high-quality cooking and unique culinary offerings.

properties.name: Shinhwa Korean Steakhouse
properties.location:
2407 S Wentworth Ave
Chicago, IL 60616
USA
properties.description: Shinhwa Korean Steakhouse, located at 2407 S Wentworth Ave in Chicago's Chinatown, offers an interactive dining experience featuring authentic Korean BBQ and hot pot. Guests can enjoy premium cuts of marinated meats, fresh seafood, and a variety of vegetables, all prepared tableside. The restaurant utilizes modern technology, including iPad ordering and robot waiters, to enhance the dining experience. The all-you-can-eat menu allows patrons to customize their meal with a selection of broths, sauces, and desserts. The modern ambiance and attentive service make it a popular destination for both locals and visitors seeking a unique Korean dining experience.

properties.name: Happy Lamb Hot Pot
properties.location:
2312 S Wentworth Ave
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: Did you know? The most authentic way to enjoy our hot pot is to do so without dipping sauces. Unlike other style of hot pot, our unique broth has been seasoned and simmered for over 8 hours. The bone marrow will adhere the flavors onto the food, allowing you to taste the true savory flavors of meat and pure sweetness of vegetables. Although not recommended, sauces are available upon request.

properties.name: Slurp Slurp
properties.location:
2247 S Wentworth Ave
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: Slurp Slurp is a Chinese noodle restaurant situated in Chicago's Chinatown district. The eatery is known for its authentic hand-pulled noodles and a variety of flavorful soups. The menu features dishes such as beef brisket noodle soup, pork belly chow noodles, and steamed buns. The restaurant offers a casual and cozy atmosphere, making it a popular spot for both locals and visitors seeking traditional Chinese cuisine.

properties.name: Triple Crown Restaurant
properties.location:
2217 S Wentworth Ave
Chicago, IL 60616
United States
properties.description: Triple Crown Restaurant, established in 1996, is a family-owned establishment in Chicago's Chinatown, specializing in Cantonese cuisine and dim sum. The restaurant offers an extensive menu featuring traditional dishes such as stir-fried Chinese broccoli with rice wine, pan-fried shrimp and chives dumplings, and puffy egg custard tarts. Dim sum is served all day, every day, with a late-night menu available from 10 PM to 2 AM, offering nearly half-off on all items. The restaurant is known for its lively atmosphere and authentic flavors, making it a popular destination for both locals and visitors seeking a genuine Chinese dining experience.

properties.name: Dolo Restaurant & Bar
properties.location:
2222 S. Archer Ave.
Chicago, 60616
USA
properties.description: Dolo Restaurant & Bar, located at 2222 S. Archer Ave. in Chicago's Chinatown, offers a modern dining experience with a full bar and ample parking. The menu features fresh, made-to-order dim sum, including unique items like pan-fried vegetable and pork buns and durian pancakes. Live seafood, such as Canadian lobsters and King crabs, is delivered weekly to ensure freshness. Signature dishes include the Dolo-style seafood combo, combining crab legs, crawfish, clams, shrimp, sausages, corn, and potatoes in a homemade Cajun sauce. The restaurant also provides private dining rooms and hosts special events like birthdays and weddings.

properties.name: HaiSous Vietnamese Kitchen
properties.location:
1800 S. Carpenter Ave.
Chicago, 60608
USA
properties.description: HaiSous Vietnamese Kitchen, situated in Chicago's Pilsen neighborhood, is a celebrated establishment offering authentic Vietnamese cuisine. Founded by Chef Thai Dang and his wife, Danielle, the restaurant presents a menu divided into five sections, featuring lesser-known and unexpected dishes. The dining space includes an open kitchen with comfortable seating, a bar area serving cocktails and renowned chicken wings, and two dining rooms, one with communal seating. Signature dishes include goi vit (duck salad) and ché, a Vietnamese rice pudding with coconut, sesame, and toasted peanuts. Adjacent to the restaurant is Cà Phê Đá, a café specializing in street food, specialty coffee, and cocktails.

properties.name: Don Pedro Carnitas
properties.location:
1113 W 18th St
Chicago, IL 60608
USA
properties.description: Don Pedro Carnitas is a family-owned establishment in Chicago's Pilsen neighborhood, renowned for its authentic Mexican carnitas. The pork is deep-fried to perfection, resulting in tender, flavorful meat with crispy chicharron pieces. Patrons can enjoy carnitas by the pound, accompanied by fresh tortillas, cilantro, onions, lime, and pico de gallo. The menu also features brain tacos and flavored agua frescas. The simple, welcoming dining area and friendly staff enhance the experience, making it a cherished spot for both locals and visitors seeking traditional Mexican flavors.

properties.name: Simone's
properties.location:
960 W 18th St
Chicago, IL 60608
United States
properties.description: Simone's is a distinctive restaurant and bar in Chicago's vibrant Pilsen neighborhood, celebrated for its creative use of recycled materials in its decor. The venue features a lively atmosphere with a bar made from old bowling alley lanes and booths crafted from repurposed pinball machines. Simone's offers a menu of American cuisine, emphasizing locally sourced ingredients and craft beers. It is also known for hosting live music and community events, making it a popular gathering spot for both locals and visitors.

properties.name: La Luna
properties.location:
1726 S Racine Ave
Chicago, IL 60608
United States
properties.description: La Luna is a vibrant Mexican restaurant situated in Chicago's Pilsen neighborhood. Known for its lively atmosphere, it offers a diverse menu featuring traditional dishes like quesabirria tacos, flautas, and carne asada. The restaurant also serves brunch on Sundays, with items such as chilaquiles and a chorizo breakfast sandwich. In addition to its culinary offerings, La Luna boasts a mezcal bar in the basement, providing a unique selection of cocktails in a cozy setting. The establishment has been recognized for its energetic ambiance and quality service, making it a popular destination for both locals and visitors.

properties.name: Honky Tonk BBQ / The Tonk
properties.location:
1213 W 18th St
Chicago, IL 60608
United States
properties.description: Honky Tonk BBQ, also known as The Tonk, is a Memphis-style barbecue restaurant located in Chicago's Pilsen neighborhood. Established in 2007, it offers a variety of smoked meats, including brisket, ribs, and pulled pork, complemented by sides like fried green tomatoes and cornbread muffins. The restaurant features live music events, hosting genres such as jazz, blues, country, and rockabilly, contributing to Chicago's vibrant music scene. The Tonk has been recognized for its approach to barbecue and its role in local music events.

properties.name: Quesabirria Jalisco Chicago
properties.location:
1314 W 18th St
Chicago, IL 60608
United States
properties.description: Quesabirria Jalisco Tacos is renowned for its authentic Mexican cuisine, particularly its signature quesabirria tacos. These tacos feature tender beef birria, melted cheese, and are served with a flavorful consommé for dipping. The restaurant has expanded from a food truck to a brick-and-mortar location in Chicago's Pilsen neighborhood, offering a cozy atmosphere and friendly service. The menu includes various options such as chicken and shrimp quesabirria, birria ramen, and traditional tacos. The establishment has received high ratings for its delicious food and welcoming environment.

properties.name: Stax Cafe
properties.location:
1401 W Taylor St
Chicago, IL 60607
United States
properties.description: Stax Cafe is a breakfast and brunch spot in Chicago's Little Italy neighborhood, known for its diverse menu featuring pancakes, omelettes, and sandwiches. Signature dishes include Stuffed Nutella Raspberry French Toast and Braised Beef Brisket Benedict. The cozy atmosphere attracts both locals and visitors, making it a popular choice for morning and midday meals.

properties.name: Sweet Maple Cafe
properties.location:
1339 W Taylor St
Chicago, IL 60607
United States
properties.description: Sweet Maple Cafe is a cozy breakfast and brunch spot in Chicago's Little Italy neighborhood. Known for its Southern-inspired dishes, the menu features favorites like cinnamon roll pancakes, apple spice pancakes, and the Be Creative omelette. The cafe's warm, retro-style ambiance adds to its homestyle charm, making it a beloved destination for both locals and visitors seeking a comforting meal.

properties.name: Chez Joël
properties.location:
1119 W. Taylor St.
Chicago, 60607
USA
properties.description: Chez Joël is a family-operated French bistro situated in Chicago's Little Italy neighborhood. The restaurant offers traditional French dishes such as steak frites, coq au vin, escargots, and mussels marinières. The ambiance features French posters, velvet-draped windows, and a courtyard for outdoor dining. A cozy bar area provides a space for patrons to enjoy drinks. The restaurant is known for its classic French cuisine with global influences, including specialties like frogs' legs cooked with garlic, spinach, and butter, as well as a Gruyère-topped French onion soup.

properties.name: Tuscany on Taylor
properties.location:
1014 W Taylor St
Chicago, IL 60607
United States
properties.description: Tuscany on Taylor is a longstanding Italian restaurant situated in Chicago's Little Italy neighborhood. Established in 1990, it offers a variety of Northern Italian dishes, including homemade pastas, wood-fired pizzas, and classic veal entrees. The restaurant's rustic Tuscan décor and cozy ambiance create a welcoming atmosphere for diners. It's a popular spot for both locals and visitors seeking authentic Italian flavors in a relaxed setting.

properties.name: Meli Cafe
properties.location:
301 S Halsted St
Chicago, IL 60661
USA
properties.description: Meli Cafe is a neighborhood restaurant, cafe, and juice bar located in Chicago's Greektown, River North, and Printers Row neighborhoods. The menu features farm-to-table dishes, hormone and antibiotic-free meats, fresh-squeezed juices, and homemade marmalade. Signature items include the Spicy Flamenco Omelet, Farmer's Benedict, Bread Pudding Pancakes, Brioche French Toast, Cinnamon Apple Crepes, Grilled Salmon Salad, Turkey Cranberry Pesto Wrap, and Brisket Burger. The cafe is known for its warm, inviting decor and commitment to high-quality ingredients, such as high-grade maple syrup, homemade whipped butters, fresh-baked challah bread, and Eggland's Best Organic eggs.

properties.name: Park Tavern
properties.location:
1645 W Jackson Blvd
Chicago, IL 60612
United States
properties.description: Park Tavern is a gastropub located at 1645 W Jackson Blvd, Chicago, IL 60612, offering craft beer and authentic food in a casual, urban lodge setting. It features a beer garden, over two dozen TVs, private rooms, and a sprawling bar, making it suitable for gatherings. The establishment is not part of a large chain restaurant.

properties.name: Green Street Local
properties.location:
130 S Green St
Chicago, IL 60607
United States
properties.description: Green Street Local is a restaurant situated in Chicago's West Loop neighborhood, offering a menu that blends New American comfort food with craft beers, signature cocktails, and premium wines. The establishment features a warm, mature setting with numerous TVs, making it a popular spot for sports enthusiasts. Guests can enjoy a variety of dishes, including pizzas, burgers, and chicken wings, in a casual atmosphere. The restaurant also provides catering services for various events and offers online reservations for added convenience.

properties.name: Greek Islands
properties.location:
200 S Halsted St
Chicago, IL 60661
United States
properties.description: Established in 1971, Greek Islands is a family-owned restaurant in Chicago's Greektown neighborhood, renowned for its authentic Greek cuisine. The restaurant imports high-quality ingredients directly from Greece, including extra virgin olive oil, wines, cheeses, herbs, and seafood. Signature dishes include saganaki, grilled octopus, and moussaka. The ambiance reflects traditional Greek hospitality, offering a festive and welcoming atmosphere. Greek Islands also provides catering services for various events, accommodating both sit-down and buffet-style gatherings. The restaurant has been featured on the Food Network's "The Hungry Detective" and is recognized as one of Chicago's premier Greek dining establishments.

properties.name: Bar Mar
properties.location:
120 N. Wacker Dr.
Chicago, 60606
USA
properties.description: Bar Mar, located at 120 N. Wacker Dr., Chicago, IL 60606, USA, is a seafood-focused restaurant by Chef José Andrés. Situated in the Bank of America Tower, it offers a menu blending Spanish and Latin-American flavors, featuring dishes like mussels in escabeche and bigeye tuna ceviche. The décor includes a glowing octopus sculpture above the central bar, emphasizing the oceanic theme. The establishment is recognized by the MICHELIN Guide.

properties.name: Beatnik On The River
properties.location:
180 N Wacker Dr
Chicago, IL 60606
United States
properties.description: Beatnik On The River is a distinctive restaurant situated along the Chicago River, offering a unique dining experience with its bohemian-inspired interiors and lush gardens. The establishment draws inspiration from the bohemian freethinkers of the 1950s and 1960s, creating an exotic escape that combines maximalist design with a vibrant atmosphere. The culinary offerings take guests on a global journey, featuring dishes that blend Eastern Mediterranean, Northern African, and Mexican flavors. The beverage menu includes tropical cocktails crafted with inventive recipes and a sustainable, no-waste approach. The wine list highlights winemakers from lesser-known regions of the Mediterranean and the Americas, each with their own unique story.

properties.name: Prime & Provisions
properties.location:
222 N. LaSalle St.
Chicago, 60601
USA
properties.description: Prime & Provisions is a sophisticated steakhouse situated at the intersection of LaSalle Street and Wacker Drive in Chicago. Spanning 12,000 square feet, the restaurant features a ground floor and a second-floor dining area, offering views of the Chicago River. The interior design draws inspiration from 1920s supper clubs, blending traditional elegance with modern aesthetics. The menu focuses on classic steakhouse offerings, emphasizing high-quality, hand-cut steaks. The venue also provides private dining options, accommodating various events from weddings to corporate gatherings.

properties.name: Prosecco
properties.location:
710 N Wells St
Chicago, IL 60654
United States
properties.description: Prosecco is a regional Italian restaurant and wine bar situated in Chicago's River North Gallery District. The restaurant offers upscale comfort food from all 20 regions of Italy in a Venetian-inspired atmosphere. The menu features dishes such as Gamberi Primavera, prepared with house-made spinach tagliatelle, sautéed shrimp, baby spinach, heirloom cherry tomatoes, and a drizzle of pesto olive oil. Prosecco also boasts an extensive selection of Italian sparkling wines, including one of the largest selections of Prosecco in Chicago. The interior has undergone substantial renovations, including new lighting fixtures, flooring, art installations, and a handcrafted 35-foot-long quartz-topped bar with a temperature-controlled walk-in wine cellar.

properties.name: Happy Camper
properties.location:
1209 N Wells St
Chicago, IL 60610
United States
properties.description: Happy Camper is a vibrant pizzeria and bar situated in Chicago's Old Town neighborhood. The establishment boasts a distinctive camp-themed decor, featuring Airstream trailers, neon renditions of the Great Lakes, and tire swing seating around the bar. The menu offers a variety of creative pizzas, including the signature Happy Camper pizza with vodka sauce, as well as appetizers like meatball sliders and goat cheese breadsticks. Guests can enjoy a lively atmosphere with options for indoor and outdoor seating, complemented by a selection of craft beers and camping-inspired cocktails.

properties.name: Orso's
properties.location:
1401 N Wells St
Chicago, IL 60610
United States
properties.description: Orso's is a family-owned Italian restaurant situated in Chicago's historic Old Town area. Established as one of the oldest eateries in the neighborhood, it offers a charming old-world atmosphere. The extensive menu features authentic Italian dishes, including pasta, chicken, veal, and fresh fish entrees. The restaurant provides various dining areas, such as a covered patio, dining room, and outdoor spaces, accommodating both casual meals and special events like cocktail parties and weddings. With attentive service and a diverse menu, Orso's aims to deliver an unforgettable dining experience.

properties.name: Benchmark
properties.location:
1510 N Wells St
Chicago, IL 60610
USA
properties.description: Benchmark is a vibrant sports bar and restaurant situated in Chicago's Old Town neighborhood. The venue features a spacious two-floor layout with indoor and outdoor seating options, including Chicago's first convertible beer garden with a fully retractable roof. The menu offers a variety of American favorites, such as the Benchmark Burger made with a house-ground brisket, short rib, and chuck patty blend, and Thai Chicken Wings. The establishment is equipped with 46 TVs, making it an ideal spot for sports enthusiasts. Additionally, Benchmark hosts happy hour specials and private events, contributing to its lively atmosphere.

properties.name: Topo Gigio Ristorante
properties.location:
1516 N Wells St
Chicago, IL 60610
United States
properties.description: Situated in Chicago's historic Old Town neighborhood, Topo Gigio Ristorante has been serving authentic Italian cuisine since 1982. The restaurant offers a warm and inviting atmosphere, blending old-world charm with contemporary elegance. The menu features a variety of Italian classics, including fresh pastas, wood-fired pizzas, and premium seafood and meat dishes. Guests can enjoy dining in the cozy interior, on the beautiful outdoor garden patio, or in the covered outdoor bar area, which is open year-round. For private events, the second-floor party room accommodates 35 to 90 people and boasts vaulted ceilings and a full bar. Topo Gigio Ristorante is consistently voted as one of the best Italian restaurants in Chicago, making it a beloved spot for both locals and visitors.

properties.name: The VIG Chicago
properties.location:
1527 N Wells St
Chicago, IL 60610
United States
properties.description: The VIG Chicago is a 1950s-themed sports parlor located in the heart of Old Town. It offers a refined kitchen and classic cocktails designed for the contemporary drinker. The concept centers around the playful storyline that it's good to be bad, drawing inspiration from movies, sports, and historical scenarios where we reluctantly connect with the bad guy. This theme is reflected in the architectural and design work, as well as the food and drink menus. Every aspect of The VIG is designed to inspire the lost art of conversation. The restaurant opened its doors in October 2015 and has been serving great food and beverages that entice the palate, providing an atmosphere of a refined sports parlor.

properties.name: Kamehachi
properties.location:
1531 N Wells St
Chicago, IL 60610
United States
properties.description: Established in 1967, Kamehachi is Chicago's oldest sushi bar, offering a diverse menu that includes signature rolls, sashimi, and traditional Japanese dishes. The restaurant features a sushi bar, outdoor patio, and private dining areas, providing a relaxed yet stylish setting for diners. Known for its fresh ingredients and attentive service, Kamehachi has become a staple in the Old Town neighborhood, attracting both locals and visitors seeking authentic Japanese cuisine.

properties.name: Twin Anchors Restaurant & Tavern
properties.location:
1655 N Sedgwick St
Chicago, IL 60614
United States
properties.description: Established in 1932, Twin Anchors Restaurant & Tavern is a historic eatery situated in Chicago's Old Town neighborhood. Housed in a building dating back to 1881, it has been a local favorite for decades. The restaurant is renowned for its slow-cooked baby back ribs, which are baked and then grilled, served with a choice of sauces: Prohibition, Zesty, or the original mild. In addition to ribs, the menu features steaks, chicken, shrimp, and burgers. The establishment has a rich history, having operated as a speakeasy during Prohibition and frequented by notable figures like Frank Sinatra. Twin Anchors offers a cozy atmosphere with both dine-in and outdoor seating options.

properties.name: Sushi Para II
properties.location:
2258 N Clark St
Chicago, IL 60614
United States
properties.description: Sushi Para II, located at 2258 N Clark St in Chicago, is a popular destination for sushi enthusiasts. The restaurant offers an all-you-can-eat menu featuring a variety of sushi rolls, sashimi, and traditional Japanese dishes. Patrons appreciate the freshness of the fish and the generous portions. The BYOB policy allows guests to bring their own beverages, enhancing the dining experience. The cozy atmosphere and attentive service contribute to its reputation as a go-to spot for quality sushi in Chicago.

properties.name: The Pasta Bowl
properties.location:
2434 N Clark St
Chicago, IL 60614
United States
properties.description: Established in 1996, The Pasta Bowl - Lincoln Park offers a cozy and casual dining experience in Chicago's Lincoln Park neighborhood. The menu features a variety of Italian dishes, including signature items like Farfalle Pollo, a bowtie pasta with grilled chicken, sun-dried and fresh tomatoes, cream, pecorino cheese, mushrooms, and basil. Appetizers such as garlic cheese bread and ravioli tostati complement the main courses. The restaurant also offers a selection of wines and desserts, including tiramisu and molten lava cake. The inviting atmosphere and generous portions make it a popular choice for both locals and visitors seeking authentic Italian cuisine.

properties.name: Cesar's Killer Margaritas
properties.location:
2924 N Broadway
Chicago, IL 60657
United States
properties.description: Cesar's Killer Margaritas - Broadway is a family-owned Mexican restaurant situated at the corner of North Broadway Street and West Oakdale Avenue in Chicago's Lakeview neighborhood. The establishment is renowned for its extensive selection of margaritas, offering over a dozen flavors, including traditional lime, guava, and mango. In addition to its signature drinks, the menu features authentic Mexican dishes such as enchiladas, costillas, and fajitas. The restaurant provides various dining options, including dine-in, pick-up, and delivery services. It also offers catering services for events like corporate outings and family gatherings. The ambiance includes an outdoor patio, a rooftop deck, and indoor seating, accommodating guests year-round.

properties.name: Crisp
properties.location:
2940 N Broadway
Chicago, IL 60657
United States
properties.description: Crisp is a Korean-style fried chicken restaurant in Chicago's Lakeview neighborhood. Founded by Chef Jae Lee, it offers a variety of dishes, including wings, sandwiches, and Buddha Bowls, all inspired by Korean flavors. The restaurant is BYOB, allowing guests to bring their own beverages to complement the meal. Crisp has been recognized for its flavorful and crispy fried chicken, with its Seoul Sassy wings being particularly popular. The establishment features communal seating, creating a lively and energetic atmosphere. While the focus is on the food, the decor is simple and clean, emphasizing the dining experience.

properties.name: Maison Marcel
properties.location:
3114 N Broadway
Chicago, IL 60657
United States
properties.description: Maison Marcel is a French bakery and café situated in Chicago's Lakeview neighborhood. The establishment offers a variety of French-inspired dishes and pastries, including artisanal croissants, quiches, and a selection of savory and sweet items. The interior features a boho-inspired design, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere for guests. The café also hosts live music events and offers bottomless mimosas during brunch, enhancing the dining experience.

properties.name: Pancake Cafe
properties.location:
3805 North Broadway
Chicago, IL 60613
United States
properties.description: Pancake Café, located in Chicago's Wrigleyville neighborhood, offers a diverse menu featuring pancakes, omelets, French toast, and more. They emphasize using locally sourced ingredients, such as hand-cut bacon from Jones Farm and freshly squeezed orange juice. The restaurant is open daily from 8:00 AM to 3:00 PM, providing a cozy atmosphere for breakfast, brunch, and lunch.

properties.name: El Mariachi Tequila Bar & Grill
properties.location:
3906 North Broadway
Chicago, IL 60613
United States
properties.description: El Mariachi Tequila Bar & Grill, established over 20 years ago, offers authentic Mexican cuisine complemented by an extensive selection of over 100 tequilas and mezcales. Signature offerings include tableside guacamole prepared with unique avocado oil and a bottomless mimosa brunch on weekends. The restaurant's ambiance features imported handcrafted decor, intimate lighting, and traditional festive music. Private party rooms and an outdoor patio can accommodate up to 120 guests, making it suitable for various events.

properties.name: IO Godfrey Rooftop Lounge
properties.location:
127 W Huron St
Chicago, IL 60654
United States
properties.description: I|O Godfrey Rooftop Lounge, located on the 4th floor of the Godfrey Hotel Chicago, offers a distinctive indoor-outdoor experience with panoramic views of the Chicago skyline. The venue features a state-of-the-art retractable roof, allowing guests to enjoy the outdoors in favorable weather and a cozy indoor setting during colder months. The lounge encompasses approximately 15,000 square feet of space, including 10,000 square feet dedicated to lounge and event areas. Guests can enjoy chef-crafted cocktails in communal booths, and during winter, the venue offers signature winter wonderland igloos. The menu includes New American fare, with options like lamb lollichops, sushi, and dishes from the grill. The venue also features fire pits, shimmering water elements, and a video wall, creating a vibrant atmosphere for both daytime and evening gatherings.

properties.name: Zombie Taco
properties.location:
530 N La Salle Dr
Chicago, IL 60654
USA
properties.description: Zombie Taco is a casual, counter-serve taco joint in Chicago's River North neighborhood, offering a fun and quirky take on classic Mexican fare. With a focus on fresh ingredients and unique flavor combinations, Zombie Taco is a popular spot for a quick and satisfying meal. Their menu features a variety of tacos, burritos, and sides, all made with high-quality ingredients and served in a lively and energetic atmosphere. It's a great option for those seeking a casual and tasty bite in the River North area.

properties.name: Tanta
properties.location:
118 W Grand Ave
Chicago, IL 60654
United States
properties.description: Tanta is a Peruvian restaurant located at 118 W Grand Ave, Chicago, IL 60654. It offers traditional Peruvian cuisine in a casual downtown setting, featuring a seasonal rooftop terrace. The menu includes ceviches, anticuchos (skewers), and Chinese-inspired Del Chifa dishes. Tanta also serves pisco-inspired Peruvian cocktails. The restaurant provides private dining options and catering services.

properties.name: Arbella
properties.location:
112 W Grand Ave
Chicago, IL 60654
USA
properties.description: Arbella is a sophisticated cocktail lounge situated in Chicago's River North neighborhood. The venue offers a globally inspired drink menu, featuring innovative cocktails crafted with unique ingredients and techniques. The ambiance is sleek and modern, providing an inviting yet upscale atmosphere suitable for both casual drinks and special occasions. Complementing the drinks, Arbella serves a menu of elevated bar snacks that blend international flavors with local influences. The venue also features The B-Side, an intimate music space that hosts DJs and live performances, adding to the bar's lively and dynamic vibe.

properties.name: Chicago Cut Steakhouse
properties.location:
300 N. LaSalle St.
Chicago, 60654
USA
properties.description: Chicago Cut Steakhouse is a renowned steakhouse situated along the Chicago River, celebrated for its prime cuts of beef and sophisticated ambiance. The establishment prides itself on serving only the finest ingredients, offering a menu that features dry-aged steaks, fresh seafood, and a selection of gourmet sides. With an extensive wine list curated to complement the dishes, the restaurant provides a warm and inviting atmosphere, making it a popular choice for both business dinners and special occasions. Its picturesque view of the river adds to the dining experience.

properties.name: ROOF on theWit
properties.location:
201 N State St 27th Floor
Chicago, IL 60601
United States
properties.description: Perched 27 stories above Chicago, ROOF on theWit offers a dynamic nightlife experience with panoramic city views, live DJs, and a menu featuring fresh sushi, wood-fired flatbreads, and seasonal dishes. Recognized as one of the top rooftop bars globally, it provides a vibrant atmosphere for guests seeking a unique dining and entertainment venue.

properties.name: Yardbird Table & Bar
properties.location:
530 N Wabash Ave
Chicago, IL 60654
United States
properties.description: Yardbird Table & Bar, situated in Chicago's River North neighborhood, offers a modern take on Southern comfort food. Signature dishes include Lewellyn's Fine Fried Chicken, deviled eggs, and lobster mac and cheese. The restaurant boasts an extensive bourbon collection, featuring unique cocktails and bourbon flights. Designed by the Rockwell Group, the interior features a floating bourbon room above the bar, available for private dining for up to eight guests. The ambiance is energetic and classy, with a warm and inviting atmosphere.

properties.name: Wildberry Pancakes & Cafe
properties.location:
130 E Randolph St
Chicago, IL 60601
United States
properties.description: Wildberry Pancakes & Cafe is a popular breakfast and brunch spot in Chicago's Loop district, known for its extensive menu featuring a variety of pancakes, waffles, omelets, and specialty Benedicts. Signature dishes include the Berry Bliss Pancakes and the Butcher's Block Skillet. The restaurant offers both indoor and outdoor seating, with the outdoor area providing a cozy atmosphere, especially during early morning hours. While the establishment operates on a first-come, first-served basis, it can experience wait times during peak hours due to its popularity. The menu caters to various dietary preferences, including gluten-free options, ensuring a satisfying dining experience for a diverse clientele.
